trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_SEQ_00<tab>Qhoterl Pasol wants to give the Stopple a touch of home.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid slate in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Deliver the splendid slate to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid water ivy in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Deliver the splendid water ivy to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch a splendid eryops at Lake Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Deliver the splendid eryops to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Ours is a large undertaking, and we expect to be hunkered down here for a good long while. That being the case, I've a mind to add some creature comforts to the Stopple.

TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_QHOTERLPASOL_000_002<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I'd be in your debt if you could procure a few things to help me make this place a home away from home.

TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>Specifically, I require three slabs of slate. These can be had in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. Many thanks, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, and happy digging!

TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_QHOTERLPASOL_000_020<tab>Specifically, I require three lengths of water ivy. These can be had in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. Many thanks, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, and happy gathering!

TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030<tab>Specifically, I require an eryops. They dwell in the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta, and are passing fond of fruit worms. Many thanks, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, and happy fishing!
TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_QHOTERLPASOL_100_010<tab>While there's no avoiding getting a little wet, the slate ought not pose you too much trouble. I await your return with bated breath!
TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_QHOTERLPASOL_100_020<tab>While there's no avoiding getting a little wet, the water ivy ought not pose you too much trouble. I await your return with bated breath!
TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_QHOTERLPASOL_100_030<tab>So long as you use fruit worms as bait, the eryops ought not pose you too much trouble. I await your return with bated breath!
TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_QHOTERLPASOL_000_040<tab>Ah, there you are, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. May I ask if you have that which I requested?
TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_QHOTERLPASOL_000_050<tab>Yes, this is absolutely splendid! My gratitude!

TEXT_BANQIQ103_03808_QHOTERLPASOL_000_051<tab>By making the Stopple more comfortable, our workers will be better rested. And a rested worker is a <var 1A 02 /var>productive<var 1A 01 /var> worker! Oh yes, perhaps we can look into extending the length of shifts...
